QuestData.Title: Survey Says...
QuestData.Description: It is time to establish the first secure connection in our teleportation network.$B$BTake this beacon to the Ruins of Elune'eth above us and survey the area to find a suitable location.$B$BOnce your survey is complete, place the beacon and I will anchor a connection to it from here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Telemancy Beacon to survey the Ruins of Elune'eth.
QuestData.RewardText: <This seems like a good location for the teleporter.>
